extends java.lang.Object

            produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()

      • getTopTen

        @GetMapping(path="/topten",
            produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<User> getTopTen()
        This method is the end point that returns an ArrayList containing the top ten users from the database based on their point values.
        Returns:
        Arraylist containing top ten users with the highest point values.

      • login

        @PostMapping(path="/login",
             consumes="application/json")
public User login(@RequestBody
                                                                                          User u)
        This method is the end point that returns a User that contains the user's rank in the leader board, name, and points.
        Parameters:
        u - the user object that contains the info needed to login.
        Returns:
        User that was successfully logged into.

      • getRankAndUser

        @GetMapping(path="/userrank/{username}",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getRankAndUser(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String username)
        Returns a Json object that contains the user's rank in the leader board, name, and points.

        This method is the end point for getting a single user's rank in the leader board.

        Parameters:
        username - name of the user that the requester wants the rank of.
        Returns:
        a Response Entity with a json body that contains a user's rank in the leader board, name, and points.
